mapper.insert: insert into t_station_info(f_station_no, f_station_name, f_station_lon, f_station_lat, f_station_address, f_process_tech, f_process_scale, f_dev_ops_num, f_principal, f_contact_tel, f_bg_dev_img_path, f_bg_water_img_path, f_remarks1, f_remarks2, f_remarks3, f_isOnline, f_onlineModifyTime) values (#{stationNo}, #{stationName}, #{stationLon}, #{stationLat}, #{stationAddress}, #{processTech}, #{processScale}, #{devOpsNum}, #{principal}, #{connectTel}, #{bgDevImgPath}, #{bgWaterImgPath}, #{remarks1}, #{remarks2}, #{remarks3}, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: select f_station_no as stationNo, f_station_name as stationName, f_station_lon as stationLon, f_station_lat as stationLat, f_station_address as stationAddress, f_process_tech as processTech, f_process_scale as processScale, f_dev_ops_num as devOpsNum, f_principal as principal, f_contact_tel as connectTel, f_bg_dev_img_path as bgDevImgPath, f_bg_water_img_path as bgWaterImgPath, f_remarks1 as remarks1, f_remarks2 as remarks2, f_remarks3 as remarks3 from t_station_info where f_station_no = #{stationNo}
mapper.update:
update t_station_info set
f_isOnline = 1,
f_isOnline = 0,
f_onlineModifyTime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where f_station_no = #{stationNo}
mapper.select: select t.isOnLine, DATE_FORMAT(t.lastReceiveTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as lastReceiveTime from (select f_isOnline as isOnLine, f_onlineModifyTime as lastReceiveTime from t_station_info where f_station_no = #{stationNo} and (f_isOnline = 0 or abs(timestampdiff(MINUTE , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , f_onlineModifyTime)) > 1)) as t

select t.isOnLine, DATE_FORMAT(t.lastReceiveTime, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as lastReceiveTime from (select f_isOnline as isOnLine, f_onlineModifyTime as lastReceiveTime from t_station_info where f_station_no = #{stationNo} and (f_isOnline = 1 and abs(timestampdiff(MINUTE , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , f_onlineModifyTime)) <= 1)) as t
select distinct f_station_no as stationNo from t_station_info where f_isOnline = 1 and abs(timestampdiff(MINUTE , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , f_onlineModifyTime)) > 1
select distinct f_station_no as stationNo from t_station_info

select f_station_no as stationNo, f_station_name as stationName, f_station_lon as stationLon, f_station_lat as stationLat, f_station_address as stationAddress, f_process_tech as processTech, f_process_scale as processScale, f_dev_ops_num as devOpsNum, f_principal as principal, f_contact_tel as connectTel, f_bg_dev_img_path as bgDevImgPath, f_bg_water_img_path as bgWaterImgPath, f_remarks1 as remarks1, f_remarks2 as remarks2, f_remarks3 as remarks3 from t_station_info where f_station_name like #{stationName} limit #{page} , #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into t_device(f_station_no, f_dev_no, f_var_list_fields, f_var_list_fields_md5, f_start_receive_time, f_end_receive_time, f_is_show) values (#{stationNo}, #{devNo}, #{varListFields}, MD5(f_var_list_fields), #{startReceiveTime}, #{endReceiveTime}, 1)
mapper.select: select f_dev_no as devNo, f_station_no as stationNo, f_var_list_fields as varListFields, f_var_list_fields_md5 as varListFieldsMd5, f_start_receive_time as startReceiveTime, f_receive_count as receiveCount, f_end_receive_time as endReceiveTime from t_device where f_dev_no = #{devNo} and f_station_no = #{stationNo} and f_end_receive_time >= #{queryTime} and f_is_show = 1 order by f_end_receive_time desc limit 0, 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_device_info(f_station_no, f_dev_name, f_dev_type, f_dev_var_fields, f_dev_vector) values (#{stationNo}, #{devName}, #{devType}, #{devVarFields}, #{deviceVector})
mapper.delete:
delete from t_device_info where
f_dev_no in #{item}
mapper.select: select f_dev_no as devNo, f_station_no as stationNo, f_dev_name as devName, f_dev_type as devType, f_dev_var_fields as devVarFields, f_dev_vector as deviceVector from t_device_info where f_station_no = #{stationNo}

select f_dev_no as devNo, f_station_no as stationNo, f_dev_name as devName, f_dev_type as devType, f_dev_var_fields as devVarFields, f_dev_vector as deviceVector from t_device_info where f_station_no = #{stationNo}
select f_id as id, f_name as devTypeName from t_device_type;
